### Welcome to my personal R Gallery

This page host's my R scripts. I write them using R Markdown and post them here. This is not a blog, but an indexed container of my scripts, hosted with Github pages and generated with RStudio's rmarkdown functions.

#### Index


```{r, results='asis', echo = FALSE}
folder_list <- na.omit(stringr::str_extract(list.files("entries"), "^[0-9]{8}"))
folder_list <- sort(folder_list, decreasing = TRUE)
for (folder in folder_list) {
  file_list <- list.files(paste0("entries/", folder))
  # files <- files[grep("\\.html$", files)]  
  cat(paste0(folder, "/"), "<br/>")
  for (file in file_list) {
    cat(sprintf("&emsp; |- - [%s](entries/%s/%s) <br/>", file, folder, file))  
  }
}



```
